amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to preserving the continued implementation of the consistent, clear, and functional categories and exclusions of jurisdictional waters in the Navigable Waters Protection Rule.

vote.text: Amendment SA 655 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 49. Record Vote Number: 43.

action.text: Amendment SA 655 proposed by Senator Capito. (consideration: CR S452-453; text: CR S453) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to preserving the continued implementation of the consistent, clear, and functional categories and exclusions of jurisdictional waters in the Navigable Waters Protection Rule.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 655 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 49. Record Vote Number: 43.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 655 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 49. Record Vote Number: 43.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 655 proposed by Senator Capito.
